name: Creed: Rise to Glory
summary: Creed: Rise to Glory™ You are Adonis Creed, fighting toe-to-toe with the world's top opponents to establish your boxing legacy. This intense cinematic experience features new Phantom Melee Technology for impactful VR melee combat so you can train, fight, and win like Creed.
info:
• 别名: Creed：Rise to Glory
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: FTG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月25日
  • 官方网站: https://survios.com/creed/
  • 开发: Survios
  • 发行: Survios
